summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Arkiflo interior design workflow system MVP. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly with proper role-based access control.
passed_tests: Admin-only endpoints with proper access control
Role-based API access (Admin vs Designer permissions)
Login page with Google OAuth button
Sidebar navigation with role-based items (Admin: 6 items, Designer: 2 items)
Sidebar collapse/expand functionality with state persistence
Clean UI design with proper Arkiflo branding
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (10/10 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (11/11 features tested successfully)
